description: Enable natural language interaction with your Binalyze AIR system to manage assets, acquisition profiles, and organizations seamlessly. Use this server to list and query your AIR data through any MCP client, enhancing your workflow with AI-driven context access. Requires an API token for secure access to your AIR environment.

airHost.description: The host URL for the Binalyze AIR API (e.g., https://air-xyz.binalyze.com)

airApiToken.description: The API token for accessing the Binalyze AIR API. You can generate one through the AIR console.

tools.name: list_assets
tools.description: List all assets in the system

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to filter assets by. Leave empty to use default (0).

tools.name: get_asset_by_id
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific asset by its ID

id.description: The ID of the asset to retrieve

tools.name: get_asset_tasks_by_id
tools.description: Get all tasks associated with a specific asset by its ID

id.description: The ID of the asset to retrieve tasks for

tools.name: list_acquisition_profiles
tools.description: List all acquisition profiles in the system

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to filter acquisition profiles by. Leave empty to use default (0).

allOrganizations.description: Whether to include profiles from all organizations. Defaults to true.

tools.name: assign_acquisition_task
tools.description: Assign an evidence acquisition task to specific endpoints

caseId.description: The case ID to associate the acquisition with

cpuLimit.description: CPU usage limit percentage (1-100). Defaults to 80

keywords.description: Array of keywords to search for

analyzers.description: Array of analyzer IDs to use (e.g. ["bha", "wsa"])

endpointIds.description: Array of endpoint IDs to collect evidence from

organizationIds.description: Array of organization IDs to filter by. Defaults to [0]

enableEncryption.description: Whether to enable encryption. Defaults to false

enableCompression.description: Whether to enable compression. Defaults to true

acquisitionProfileId.description: The acquisition profile ID to use for the task

tools.name: get_acquisition_profile_by_id
tools.description: Get details of a specific acquisition profile by its ID

profileId.description: The ID of the acquisition profile to retrieve (e.g., "full")

tools.name: assign_image_acquisition_task
tools.description: Assign a disk image acquisition task to specific endpoints and volumes

caseId.description: The case ID to associate the acquisition with (optional)

chunkSize.description: Chunk size in bytes. Defaults to 1048576

endpoints.description: Array of endpoints and volumes to image (e.g., [{"endpointId": "uuid", "volumes": ["/dev/sda1"]}]). At least one endpoint and one volume per endpoint required.

chunkCount.description: Number of chunks to acquire. Defaults to 0 (acquire until end).

startOffset.description: Offset in bytes to start acquisition from. Defaults to 0.

repositoryId.description: The repository ID where the image will be saved

bandwidthLimit.description: Bandwidth limit in KB/s. Defaults to 100000

organizationIds.description: Array of organization IDs. Defaults to [0]

enableEncryption.description: Whether to enable encryption. Defaults to false

enableCompression.description: Whether to enable compression. Defaults to true

tools.name: create_acquisition_profile
tools.description: Create a new acquisition profile

aix.description: AIX specific configuration. Must include keys like `evidenceList` (array of strings), `artifactList` (array of strings, optional), and `customContentProfiles` (array). Example: { "evidenceList": ["logs"], ... }

name.description: Name for the new acquisition profile

linux.description: Linux specific configuration. Must include keys like `evidenceList` (array of strings), `artifactList` (array of strings, optional), `customContentProfiles` (array), and `networkCapture` (object). Example: { "evidenceList": ["logs"], ... }

macos.description: macOS specific configuration. Must include keys like `evidenceList` (array of strings), `artifactList` (array of strings, optional), `customContentProfiles` (array), and `networkCapture` (object). Example: { "evidenceList": ["logs"], ... }

windows.description: Windows specific configuration. Must include keys like `evidenceList` (array of strings), `artifactList` (array of strings, optional), `customContentProfiles` (array), and `networkCapture` (object). Example: { "evidenceList": ["evt"], "artifactList": [], "customContentProfiles": [], "networkCapture": { "enabled": false, "duration": 600, "pcap": { "enabled": false }, "networkFlow": { "enabled": false } } }

eDiscovery.description: eDiscovery configuration. Must include the key `patterns` (array of objects with `pattern` and `category` strings). Example: { "patterns": [] }

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to associate the profile with. Defaults to empty array.

tools.name: assign_reboot_task
tools.description: Assign a reboot task to specific endpoints

endpointIds.description: Endpoint ID(s) to reboot. Can be a single ID or an array of IDs.

managedStatus.description: Filter endpoints by managed status. Default is ["managed"].

organizationIds.description: Organization ID(s) to filter endpoints by. Defaults to 0.

tools.name: assign_shutdown_task
tools.description: Assign a shutdown task to specific endpoints

endpointIds.description: Endpoint ID(s) to shutdown. Can be a single ID or an array of IDs.

managedStatus.description: Filter endpoints by managed status. Default is ["managed"].

organizationIds.description: Organization ID(s) to filter endpoints by. Defaults to 0.

tools.name: assign_isolation_task
tools.description: Assign an isolation task to specific endpoints

enabled.description: Whether to enable (isolate) or disable (unisolate) isolation. Defaults to true.

endpointIds.description: Endpoint ID(s) to isolate or unisolate. Can be a single ID or an array of IDs.

managedStatus.description: Filter endpoints by managed status. Default is ["managed"].

organizationIds.description: Organization ID(s) to filter endpoints by. Defaults to 0.

tools.name: assign_log_retrieval_task
tools.description: Assign a log retrieval task to specific endpoints

endpointIds.description: Endpoint ID(s) to retrieve logs from. Can be a single ID or an array of IDs.

managedStatus.description: Filter endpoints by managed status. Default is ["managed"].

organizationIds.description: Organization ID(s) to filter endpoints by. This is REQUIRED to identify the correct endpoints. Examples: 0, "123", [0], ["123", "456"]

tools.name: assign_version_update_task
tools.description: Assign a version update task to specific endpoints

endpointIds.description: Endpoint ID(s) to update version. Can be a single ID or an array of IDs.

managedStatus.description: Filter endpoints by managed status. Default is ["managed"].

organizationIds.description: Organization ID(s) to filter endpoints by. Defaults to 0.

tools.name: list_organizations
tools.description: List all organizations in the system

tools.name: list_cases
tools.description: List all cases in the system

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to filter cases by. Leave empty to use default (0).

tools.name: list_policies
tools.description: List all policies in the system

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to filter policies by. Leave empty to use default (0).

tools.name: list_tasks
tools.description: List all tasks in the system

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to filter tasks by. Leave empty to use default (0).

tools.name: list_triage_rules
tools.description: List all triage rules in the system

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to filter triage rules by. Leave empty to use default (0).

tools.name: list_users
tools.description: List all users in the system

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to filter users by. Leave empty to use default (0).

tools.name: list_drone_analyzers
tools.description: List all drone analyzers in the system

tools.name: export_audit_logs
tools.description: Initiate an export of audit logs from the AIR system

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to filter audit logs by. Defaults to "0" or specific IDs like "123" or "123,456".

tools.name: list_audit_logs
tools.description: List audit logs from the AIR system

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to filter audit logs by. Defaults to "0" or specific IDs like "123" or "123,456".

tools.name: uninstall_assets
tools.description: Uninstall specific assets based on filters without purging data. Requires specifying `filter.includedEndpointIds`.

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs filter. Defaults to [0].

excludedEndpointIds.description: Array of endpoint IDs to exclude.

includedEndpointIds.description: REQUIRED: Array of endpoint IDs to uninstall.

filter.description: Filter object to specify which assets to uninstall.

tools.name: purge_and_uninstall_assets
tools.description: Purge data and uninstall specific assets based on filters. Requires specifying `filter.includedEndpointIds`.

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs filter. Defaults to [0].

excludedEndpointIds.description: Array of endpoint IDs to exclude.

includedEndpointIds.description: REQUIRED: Array of endpoint IDs to purge and uninstall.

filter.description: Filter object to specify which assets to purge and uninstall.

tools.name: add_tags_to_assets
tools.description: Add tags to specific assets based on filters. Requires specifying `filter.includedEndpointIds` and `tags`.

tags.description: REQUIRED: Array of tags to add to the selected assets.

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs filter. Defaults to [0].

excludedEndpointIds.description: Array of endpoint IDs to exclude.

includedEndpointIds.description: REQUIRED: Array of endpoint IDs to add tags to.

filter.description: Filter object to specify which assets to add tags to.

tools.name: remove_tags_from_assets
tools.description: Remove tags from specific assets based on filters. Requires specifying `filter.includedEndpointIds` and `tags`.

tags.description: REQUIRED: Array of tags to remove from the selected assets.

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs filter. Defaults to [0].

excludedEndpointIds.description: Array of endpoint IDs to exclude.

includedEndpointIds.description: REQUIRED: Array of endpoint IDs to remove tags from.

filter.description: Filter object to specify which assets to remove tags from.

tools.name: create_auto_asset_tag
tools.description: Create a new rule to automatically tag assets based on specified conditions for Linux, Windows, and macOS.

tag.description: The tag name to be applied automatically.

conditions.description: Array of conditions or nested groups.

tools.name: update_auto_asset_tag
tools.description: Update an existing auto asset tag rule.

id.description: The ID of the auto asset tag to update.

tag.description: The tag name to be applied automatically.

conditions.description: Array of conditions or nested groups.

tools.name: get_auto_asset_tag_by_id
tools.description: Get details of a specific auto asset tag rule by its ID

id.description: The ID of the auto asset tag to retrieve

tools.name: delete_auto_asset_tag_by_id
tools.description: Delete a specific auto asset tag rule by its ID

id.description: The ID of the auto asset tag to delete

tools.name: list_auto_asset_tags
tools.description: List all auto asset tag rules in the system.

tools.name: start_tagging
tools.description: Start the auto asset tagging process for assets matching filter criteria.

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs filter. Defaults to [0].

excludedEndpointIds.description: Array of endpoint IDs to exclude.

includedEndpointIds.description: Array of endpoint IDs to include.

filter.description: Filter object to specify which assets to apply auto tagging to.

tools.name: acquire_baseline
tools.description: Assign a baseline acquisition task to specific endpoints

caseId.description: The case ID to associate the baseline acquisition with

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs filter. Defaults to [0]

excludedEndpointIds.description: Array of endpoint IDs to exclude

includedEndpointIds.description: Array of endpoint IDs to include for baseline acquisition

filter.description: Filter object to specify which assets to acquire baseline from

tools.name: compare_baseline
tools.description: Compare baseline acquisition tasks for a specific endpoint

taskIds.description: Array of baseline task IDs to compare (minimum 2)

endpointId.description: The endpoint ID to compare baselines for

tools.name: get_comparison_report
tools.description: Get comparison result report for a specific endpoint and task

taskId.description: The ID of the comparison task to get the report for

endpointId.description: The endpoint ID associated with the comparison task

tools.name: list_acquisition_artifacts
tools.description: List all acquisition artifacts available for evidence collection

tools.name: list_e_discovery_patterns
tools.description: List all e-discovery patterns for file type detection

tools.name: create_policy
tools.description: Create a new policy with specific storage and compression settings

path.description: Path for evidence storage on Linux

useMostFreeVolume.description: Whether to use volume with most free space

path.description: Path for evidence storage on macOS

useMostFreeVolume.description: Whether to use volume with most free space

path.description: Path for evidence storage on Windows

useMostFreeVolume.description: Whether to use volume with most free space

saveTo.description: Configuration for where to save evidence

sendTo.description: Configuration for where to send evidence

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to associate with policy. Defaults to [0].

tools.name: update_policy
tools.description: Update an existing policy with specific storage and filter settings

id.description: The ID of the policy to update

conditions.description: Array of conditions for policy filtering

filter.description: Filter conditions to determine which endpoints the policy applies to

path.description: Path for evidence storage on Linux

useMostFreeVolume.description: Whether to use volume with most free space

path.description: Path for evidence storage on macOS

useMostFreeVolume.description: Whether to use volume with most free space

path.description: Path for evidence storage on Windows

useMostFreeVolume.description: Whether to use volume with most free space

saveTo.description: Configuration for where to save evidence

sendTo.description: Configuration for where to send evidence

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to associate with policy. Defaults to [0].

tools.name: get_policy_by_id
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific policy by its ID

id.description: The ID of the policy to retrieve

tools.name: update_policy_priorities
tools.description: Update the priority order of policies

ids.description: Ordered list of policy IDs that defines their priority (first has highest priority)

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to associate with priority update. Defaults to [0].

tools.name: get_policy_match_stats
tools.description: Get statistics on how many endpoints match each policy based on filter criteria

searchTerm.description: General search term for filtering assets

groupFullPath.description: Filter assets by full group path

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to filter by. Defaults to [0].

tools.name: delete_policy_by_id
tools.description: Delete a specific policy by its ID

id.description: The ID of the policy to delete

tools.description: Get all assignments associated with a specific task by its ID

taskId.description: The ID of the task to retrieve assignments for

tools.description: Cancel a task assignment by its ID

assignmentId.description: The ID of the task assignment to cancel

tools.name: delete_task_assignment
tools.description: Delete a specific task assignment by its ID

assignmentId.description: The ID of the task assignment to delete

id.description: The ID of the task to retrieve

tools.description: Cancel a specific task by its ID

id.description: The ID of the task to cancel

tools.name: delete_task_by_id
tools.description: Delete a specific task by its ID

id.description: The ID of the task to delete

tools.description: List all triage rule tags in the system

withCount.description: Whether to include count of rules for each tag. Defaults to true.

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to filter triage tags by. Leave empty to use default (0).

tools.name: create_triage_tag
tools.description: Create a new triage rule tag

name.description: Name of the tag to create

organizationId.description: Organization ID to associate the tag with. Defaults to 0.

tools.name: create_triage_rule
tools.description: Create a new triage rule

description.description: A descriptive name for the triage rule

organizationIds.description: Organization IDs to associate with this rule. Defaults to [0]

tools.description: Update an existing triage rule by ID

id.description: ID of the triage rule to update

description.description: A descriptive name for the triage rule

tools.description: Delete an existing triage rule by ID

id.description: ID of the triage rule to delete

tools.description: Get a specific triage rule by its ID

id.description: The ID of the triage rule to retrieve

rule.description: The YARA rule content to validate

caseId.description: Case ID for the triage task

ownerUserId.description: User ID of the case owner

organizationId.description: Organization ID to create the case in. Defaults to 0.

assignedUserIds.description: Array of user IDs to assign to the case. Defaults to empty array.

tools.description: Update an existing case by ID

visibility.description: New visibility setting for the case

ownerUserId.description: New owner user ID for the case
